body.bibl: Dickens, Mark. “Gog and Magog in Syriac Literature I: Literature Unconnected to the Alexander Legend Prior to Michael the Syrian.” In Gog and Magog: Contributions toward a World History of an Apocalyptic Motif, edited by Georges Tamer, Andrew Mein, and Lutz Greisiger, 1:105–32.
